ExploreFact.Text: I found a cluster of small planetoids just outside of the Bramble dimension I arrived in.
I found some ruins scattered on the planetoids.
I found some Nomai text about talking about an exit from the dimension that is just barely visible from one of the smaller planetoids.
I found Nomai text that mentions a larger planetoid that was found near the center of this dimension.
I found a shrine on the largest planetoid, dedicated to the first tree that the stranded Nomai found.
I found a recorder at the base of the tree. The recorder details the Nomai's thoughts as they found the cluster of planetoids.
